mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.enname AS "enname", a.db_username AS "dbUserName", a.db_password AS "dbPassword", a.db_url AS "dbUrl", a.db_driver AS "dbDriver"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_datasource( id, name, enname, db_username, db_password, db_url, db_driver ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{enname}, #{dbUserName}, #{dbPassword}, #{dbUrl}, #{dbDriver} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_datasource SET name = #{name}, enname = #{enname}, db_username = #{dbUserName}, db_password = #{dbPassword}, db_url = #{dbUrl}, db_driver = #{dbDriver} WHERE id = #{id}
